TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStopListeningRegisteredObject implements class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

summary.span: 從 IIS 接聽 GL_STOP_LISTENING 通知。

span.span: Listens for GL_STOP_LISTENING notifications from IIS.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作介面，方法將物件傳遞至方法。You can implement the interface by passing an object to the method. 傳遞的物件會接聽`GL_STOP_LISTENING`從 IIS 的通知。The passed object listens for `GL_STOP_LISTENING` notifications from IIS. 您可以呼叫此實作中，當 ASP.NET 收到`GL_STOP_LISTENING`從 IIS，以指示 IIS 已經不再接聽新的要求此應用程式的通知。You can call this implementation when ASP.NET receives a `GL_STOP_LISTENING` notification from IIS, which signals that IIS is no longer listening for new requests for this application. Web 伺服器可以讓進行中，才能執行到完成的要求。The web server can allow requests that are in progress to run to completion. 如果您長時間執行要求的應用程式程序，您可能想要有這些 IIS 通知，以依正常程序要求風力接聽應用程式。If your application processes long running requests, you might want to have the application listen for these IIS notifications to gracefully wind down the request. 方法的相反方法，以指示應用程式立即關閉。The method contrasts with the method, which signals immediate application shutdown.

threadsafe.span: 此類型的執行個體成員並非都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Instance members of this type are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 可以在任何時間，包括在另一個方法的呼叫時呼叫方法 (例如) 相同的物件上執行程式或其他物件呼叫方法正在執行。

span.span: The method can be called at any time, including while a call to another method (such as ) on this same object is executing or while calls to other objects' methods are executing.

threadsafe.span: 因為這些方法的執行是多執行緒，所以間隔可能呼叫方法，即使呼叫已完成。

span.span: Because the execution of these methods is multithreaded, there is an interval in which the method might be called even after a call to has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening() cil managed

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整合模式在 IIS 中執行時，才支援方法。The method is supported only when running in IIS integrated mode. ASP.NET 執行階段不保證方法會引發。The ASP.NET runtime does not guarantee that the method will ever fire. 方法未擲回例外狀況，否則行為是未定義，並可能會終止處理程序。The method must not throw exceptions, otherwise the behavior is undefined and the process will likely be terminated. 此外，若要避免死結，方法不會封鎖執行。Further, to avoid creating deadlocks, the method should not block execution. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在許多應用程式方法可以在相同時間執行方法。In many applications the method can run at the same time as the method. 如果卸載，就會發生，方法可能會被強制中止之前執行完成。If unload occurs, the method might be forcibly aborted before it finishes executing.
